name: NSExtensionContext
desc: The host app context from which an app extension is invoked.

items.name: cancelRequest
items.desc: Tells the host app to cancel the app extension request, with a supplied error.

items.name: widgetLargestAvailableDisplayMode
items.desc: The largest display mode the widget supports.

items.name: widgetActiveDisplayMode
items.desc: The active display mode of the widget.

items.name: widgetMaximumSize
items.desc: Returns the maximum size for the specified widget display mode.

items.name: inputItems
items.desc: The list of input NSExtensionItem objects associated with the context.

items.name: mediaPlayingStarted
items.desc: Tells the system that the Notification Content app extension began playing a media file.

items.name: mediaPlayingPaused
items.desc: Tells the system that the Notification Content app extension stopped playing a media file.

items.name: intent
items.desc: Metadata for populating your share extensions interface.

items.name: hostedViewMinimumAllowedSize
items.desc: The minimum size for a Siri hosted view.

items.name: hostedViewMaximumAllowedSize
items.desc: The maximum size for a Siri hosted view.

items.name: interfaceParametersDescription
items.desc: Returns a human-readable string describing the data that SiriKit displays to the user when you handle an intent.

items.name: NSExtensionHostDidBecomeActive
items.desc: Posted when the extension’s host app moves from the inactive to the active state.

items.name: NSExtensionHostWillResignActive
items.desc: Posted when the extension’s host app moves from the active to the inactive state.

items.name: NSExtensionHostDidEnterBackground
items.desc: Posted when the extension’s host app begins running in the background.

items.name: NSExtensionHostWillEnterForeground
items.desc: Posted when the extension’s host app begins running in the foreground.
